NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Assembly and column Retail is the flow between 136 and 146? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 120 and 125? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Test Facility to node Convenience Store and from node North Hub to node Auto Factory, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Food Processing Plant to node Component Assembly, from node Quality Check to node Outlet Mall, and from node East Hub to node Auto Factory, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Neighborhood Store to node Regional Warehouse A, from node Test Facility to node Neighborhood Store, and from node Labeling to node Convenience Store, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Warehouse of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Express Sorting Center to target node Spare Parts Depot? Please list all node labels along this path.
